actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Credit Control Act of 1969.

summary.text: Amends the Credit Control Act to require the President, before authorizing the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to regulate and control extensions of credit, to first report to Congress and receive congressional approval expressed in a concurrent resolution on such authorization.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Credit Control Act of 1969.
